CanvasJS React Charts

CanvasJS React Chart Component for creating interactive charts and graphs for your react applications. Library supports a wide range of chart types including bar, line, area, pie, doughnut, etc.

Installing CanvasJS React Charts

Download CanvasJS React Charts

Download the commercial version of React Chart Package from My Account Page. Copy '@canvasjs' folder into src (lib or assets) folder of your app.

Import React Chart Component

Import the React Chart module into your React application. 

import CanvasJSReact from './@canvasjs/react-charts';
//var CanvasJSReact = require('./@canvasjs/react-charts');

var CanvasJSChart = CanvasJSReact.CanvasJSChart;
Set the chart-options & create chart

Set the chart-options & use ‘CanvasJSChart’ selector to create chart.

class App extends Component {
  render() {
    const options = {
      title: {
        text: "Basic Column Chart in React"
      },
      data: [{
        type: "column",
        dataPoints: [
          { label: "Apple",  y: 10  },
          { label: "Orange", y: 15  },
          { label: "Banana", y: 25  },
          { label: "Mango",  y: 30  },
          { label: "Grape",  y: 28  }
        ]
      }]
    }
    
    return (
    <div>
      <CanvasJSChart options = {options}
        /* onRef = {ref => this.chart = ref} */
      />
    </div>
    );
  }
}
